item.title: This Heart-Wrenching Christian Song Will Make You Want to Come Home
item.description: Introduction A powerful and moving Christian song, “Come Home” by singer/songwriter Jeremy Camp, has been inspiring listeners for years This song speaks to the longing of the human heart for home and for a relationship with God It speaks to the need for a place of peace, comfort, and love Overview of the Song “Come Home” is a song about longing for a place of rest. It speaks to the idea that no matter how far away we may be from our home, there is always a place of peace and comfort to be found within our relationship with God.
